ai-tha-ap216:1.3_0: one should walk keeping one’s arms steady,
ai-tha-ap216:2.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap216:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap216:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap216:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable senior venerable junior.
ai-tha-ap216:6.1_0: with one part of the senior monks, the fourth senior monks.
